title: Happy Birthday, Kanan-senpai!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Kanan-senpai~! Happy birthday~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Fufu, thank you, Kasumi-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>How do you feel being congratulated first by this cute and adorable Kasumin? Do you feel happy? Of course you feel happy, right!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Yeah, very cute, very happy<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Hmph! Don’t give me such a half-hearted response! Kasumin worked with everyone to make you lots of delicious food, you know, Kanan-senpai!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha, sorry. Thanks for working so hard for me<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ehehe. We challenged ourselves to make something incredible today~. We made.... a sushi boat for you, Kanan-senpai!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Eeh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Mari-senpai’s group brought a bunch of fish, then Kanata-senpai and Kotori-senpai gave their all into making it.... And Kasumin carefully and delicately arranged the sushi!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>You guys made a sushi boat for me!? I’m really looking forward to it! I have to dash for it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ah, wait! Kanan-senpai, you’re too fast! Wait~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Oh, sorry. Let’s go together. But as a school idol, you need to be able to keep up with this much, you know. Maybe we’ll have a special training after the party~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eeeeeh! No way! No special training~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
